title: Martial Arts - Audio Pack
description: 100 + Martial arts sound files for your game!
longDescription:
Hello!


This is my Martial Arts audio pack, here you'll find sounds that you can use in fight moments, like break bones, fight impact, shouts, smoke bomb, and others!


Here's the full list:


  1. Bone_Break_01
  2. Bone_Break_02
  3. Bone_Break_03
  4. Fight_Arcade_01
  5. Fight_Impact_01
  6. Fight_Impact_02
  7. Fight_Impact_03
  8. Fight_Impact_04
  9. Fight_Impact_05
  10. Fight_Swish_01
  11. Fight_Swish_02
  12. Fight_Swish_03
  13. Flute_01
  14. Flute_02
  15. Flute_03
  16. Gong_Hit_01
  17. Gong_Hit_02
  18. Gong_Hit_03
  19. Shout_01
  20. Shout_02
  21. Shout_03
  22. Shout_04
  23. Smoke_Bomb_01
  24. Smoke_Bomb_02
  25. Smoke_Bomb_03
  26. Stick_Sword_01
  27. Stick_Sword_02
  28. Stick_Sword_03
  29. Sword_01
  30. Sword_02
  31. Sword_03
  32. Timber_Break_01
  33. Timber_Break_02
  34. Timber_Break_03


All folders contain 3 files, 2 variations and the original, the variations are for free :)

Check the documentation
